title: IFlatPatternFeatureData.IGetExcludedFaces
description: Gets the faces that are excluded from this Flat-Pattern feature.
returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of IFace2s VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
To get the size of the array returned by this method, call
IFlatPatternFeatureData::IGetExcludedFacesCount
.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details on using this method.
